description: ROOT IS REQUIRED RAM Manager is application which optimizes the RAM of all Android devices and keep the best balance between enough free memory and running applications. This application reduces lags for a purpose of increasing speed of your device. RAM Manager is the best solution for all who have problem with the free memory, with the multitasking, with slow swapping between applications, with low performance or just want to improve the performance in all directions. You can simply boost speed of your device simply by selecting specific profile which you actually need. The main advantage of this application is that RAM Manager allows you to set your RAM according to your demands (e.g. for multitasking or for free memory or for the best balance between them). FEATURES ★Dashboard -Memory graph -Memory info ★RAM tuner -RAM tuner -Custom -Default ★Extra -Lock launcher in memory (Prevents your launcher from being killed) -Clean memory -Drop caches (Cleans page cache, dentries and inodes) -VM Heap size -Swap file ★Widget ★Languages - English, Czech, Slovak, Korean, Italian, Croatian, Polish, French, Russian, Greek, Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Spanish, Portuguese, Persian, Indonesian, Dutch ADVANTAGES OF PRO VERSION ★No ads ★All features ★Faster support ★More frequent updates ★You can support development by buying this application Twitter: https://twitter.com/Juwe11 Google+: https://www.google.com/+AdamJuva Official XDA thread: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1305060 ANY BUG OR ISSUE REPORT BY EMAIL PLEASE

description: wetter.info – genau mein Wetter Mit der kostenlosen wetter.info App jederzeit und überall über das aktuelle Wetter und die Wetteraussichten von 1,5 Mio. Orten weltweit informiert sein. Die Wetter-Highlights auf einen Blick: • Das aktuelle Wetter von über 84.000 Orten in Deutschland und 1,5 Mio. Orten weltweit • 10-Tage-Vorhersage für alle Orte • Präzise Wetterprognose durch den Zugriff auf ca. 14.000 Wetterstationen weltweit • Wetterkarten von über 180 Ländern weltweit für das Wetter von heute und die Wetteraussichten von morgen und übermorgen • Unwetterwarnungen für Deutschland und 16 weitere Länder in Europa (u.a. Italien, Spanien und Frankreich) • Niederschlagsradar – das Regenradar inklusive Schnee, Graupel und Hagel • Wetter Widgets in den Größen 2:1, 4:1, 4:2 und 5:2 in verschiedenen Designs • Wettervideos - tägliche aktualisierte Expertenvideos von Meteorologen mit Wetterberichten über die aktuelle Wetterlage und die neusten Wetterprognosen • Wetterbericht - tagesaktuelle Aufbereitung des Deutschland Wetters Schon 3,2 Millionen Mal wurde die wetter.info-App für Smartphones heruntergeladen - damit gehört sie zu den beliebtesten und meistgeladenen Apps auf dem deutschen Markt. Ob Tagesvorhersage, Wettervorschau, Wetterwarnungen oder Regenradar – die Wetter App bietet alle relevanten Wetterinformationen mit der gewohnten Genauigkeit von wetter.info! Sie haben die Möglichkeit, bis zu 15 Favoriten einzustellen und Details über Temperaturen, Windrichtung, Windgeschwindigkeit, Wetterentwicklung, Niederschlagswahrscheinlichkeit und –menge zu erfahren. Durch unsere ca. 14.000 Wetterstationen weltweit können wir Ihnen darüber hinaus die aktuelle Wetterlage inklusive Wetterprognose aus über 180 Ländern anzeigen. Regenschirm oder Sonnenbrille? Nie mehr von Regen oder Unwetter überrascht werden: Das zoombare Regenradar zeigt Ihnen an, wo es in den vergangenen 90 Minuten geregnet hat, wann es bei Ihnen regnen wird und ob es sich um einen Schauer oder ein großes Regengebiet handelt. Liegt eine Unwetterwarnung für einen Ihrer Favoriten vor, werden Sie durch eine Vorwarnung rechtzeitig informiert. Täglich neue Wettervideos - In mehrmals täglich aktualisierten Videos berichtet das Moderatorenteam über spezielle Wetterereignisse wie etwa Unwetterwarnungen, Kältewellen oder Rekordtemperaturen. Die wetter.info App bietet Ihnen die Möglichkeit verschiedene Widgets auf Ihrem Homescreen zu platzieren, um das aktuelle Wetter und die Temperatur Ihres Lieblingsorts immer im Blick zu haben. Egal ob sie Ihren Urlaub, das Wochenende oder den nächsten Outdoor-Ausflug planen wollen, mit der Wetter App von wetter.info sind Sie immer erstklassig und zuverlässig über die Wetterlage und die Wettertrends informiert. Besuchen Sie uns auch auf unserer Webseite www.wetter.info oder auf unserer Facebook-Seite https://de-de.facebook.com/wetter.info . Haben Sie Fragen, Anmerkungen oder Wünsche? Dann schicken Sie uns gerne eine Email an info@wetter.info . Auf diesem Weg können wir Ihnen weiterhelfen und eine ausführliche Antwort geben. Wir freuen uns auch über Bewertungen hier im Play Store. Vielen Dank! wetter.info - exactly my Weather be informed world with the free wetter.info app anytime, anywhere on the current weather and the weather forecast of 1.5 million locations. The weather highlights at a glance: • The current weather of over 84,000 locations in Germany and 1.5 million locations worldwide • 10-day forecast for any place • Accurate weather forecast by accessing approximately 14,000 weather stations worldwide • weather maps of over 180 countries around the world for today's weather and the weather forecast of tomorrow and beyond • Severe weather warnings for Germany and 16 other countries in Europe (among others Italy, Spain and France) • precipitation radar - rain radar including snow, sleet and hail • Weather Widgets in sizes 2: 1, 4: 1, 4: 2 and 5: 2 in different designs • Weather Videos - daily updated videos of expert meteorologists and weather reports on the current weather situation and the latest weather forecasts • Weather - daily treatment of Germany weather Already 3.2 million times the wetter.info app for smartphones has been downloaded - so it is one of the most popular and most downloaded apps in the German market. Whether day forecast, weather forecast, weather alerts or Doppler radar - the Weather app provides all relevant weather information with the usual accuracy of wetter.info! You have the option of setting up to 15 favorites and learn details about temperatures, wind direction, wind speed, weather development, probability of precipitation and amount. Our approximately 14,000 weather stations around the world, we're beyond the current weather conditions including weather forecasts from over 180 countries Show. Umbrella or sunglasses? No more of rain or storms are surprised: The zoomable Doppler radar shows you where it rained in the past 90 minutes when it will rain on you and if there is a shower or a large shower area. If there is a weather warning for one of your favorites, you will be informed by a warning. Daily new weather videos - In repeatedly updated videos each day the Moderator Team special weather events such as severe weather warnings, cold snaps or record temperatures reported. The wetter.info app gives you the option to place different widgets on your homescreen to always have the current weather and the temperature of your favorite place in the views. Whether you want to plan your vacation, the weekend or the next outdoor excursion, the weather app from wetter.info They are always top notch and reliable on the weather conditions and weather trends. Visit us on our website https://de-de.facebook.com/wetter.info www.wetter.info or on our Facebook page. If you have questions, comments or requests? Then send us an email to info@wetter.info . In this way we can help you and give a detailed answer. We also look forward to reviews here in the Play Store. Thank you so much!

description: The third learning adventure in the Nickelodeon Literacy Suite, Dora ABCs Vol 3: Ready to Read! focuses on your child's early reading and phonics skills. After reviewing letter sounds in Dora ABCs Vol 1: Letter & Letter Sounds, and learning phonemic awareness with Dora ABCs Vol 2: Rhyming Words your child is now ready to read! In Dora ABCs Vol 3: Ready to Read!, your child will begin to see that letters can be organized in a specific sequence to represent words. By changing the beginning, final or middle letters of these words, they can turn one word into another, a game called "word ladders". The ability to manipulate first, last and inside letters of simple words is an important skill to becoming a proficient reader. In this game, Dora and Boots need your child's help crossing Water Lily Lake to get to the Fantastic Frog Fiesta on the other side. By sounding out words or changing letters of words to make new ones, the player will help Dora and Boots cross the lake by hopping on the lily pads. Supportive directions and sound effects help guide your child in learning how to sound out words and start to read. In between phonics activities, three whimsical mini games with Dora's frog friends offer additional play: turn lily pads to get the frogs to a flower, match colorful frogs and flowers, or stack all the frogs on a moving lily pad to reach a high flower. All three games are interspersed among the phonics activities. Dora and Boots can't make it to the Fantastic Frog Fiesta without your child's help! ¡Vámonos! Let's go! Dora ABCs Vol 3: Ready to Read! includes: • Easy to use tutorials lead by Dora • 5 Levels of game play with a rich set of age appropriate words for beginning readers • Curriculum developed and reviewed by preschool education expert • Word ladders in which kids can change words by manipulating first, last and inside sounds. • Three whimsical frog mini games that are entertaining and replayable • Voiceovers that reinforce letter sounds and identify the vocabulary words • Tested by kids • Player profiles allow more than one child to play and saves their progress • Parent reporting which shows you how your child is progressing in this app. Dora ABCs Vol 3: Ready to Read! collects personal user data as well as non-personal user data (including aggregated data). User data collection is in accordance with applicable law, such as COPPA. User data may be used, for example, to respond to user requests; enable users to take advantage of certain features and services; personalize content and advertising; and manage and improve Nickelodeon's services. For more information regarding Nickelodeon’s use of personal user data, please visit the Nickelodeon Group Privacy Policy below. Our Privacy Policy is in addition to any terms, conditions or policies agreed to between you and Google. Nickelodeon and its affiliated entities are not responsible for Google's collection or use of your personal user data and information. Use of this app is subject to the Nickelodeon End User License Agreement. Privacy Policy: http://www.nickjr.com/info/privacy-policy.html End User License Agreement: http://www.nick.com/info/eula.html

description: Use the accelerometer to play this game of ability for all ages, where it is important to think fast and focus our attention. How to play? The game consists of moving the chip that is on the bottom of the screen and make it collide with the chips that are falling. The chip moves by rotating the device. Colliding parts are chained. Two chips can be chained if they have the same shape or the same color. Flying Kite has several game modes, each with its initial difficulty. Ranking: There is a list of the best scores for each game mode. In modes Easy, Intermediate, Advanced and Ghost you get total scoce to upload to Ranking when you complete all game levels. Total score is the sum of every level score. In Survive and Max Score modes scores can be uploaded from the first result. You can replay any level to get a better score and improve the total score. If you want to help translate Flying Kite to your language, contact the author: cerezosoft@gmail.com
release_text: Fixed minor bugs

description: Kannada <> English Dictionary offline and free. You can search both English and Kannada words. You can search words directly from "Internet Browser" or other Applications by using Sharing option. In the sharing option you will find "Kannada Dictionary" and choosing "Kannada Dictionary" will open the dictionary with the shared word so you need not type. Exiting from the dictionary will return you to "Internet Browser" or other Applications again. This is not only a Dictionary but also a learning tool. You can use this dictionary when you have no internet connection. MCQ (Multiple Choice Question) option is available. There is auto suggestion so you need not type full words. You also can use Speech to text feature . You can add words to the study plan and remove words from the study plan. When you start typing, you will see some words starting with the letters you typed. The dictionary searches in a database for the matching words. This can slow down typing in small handsets. Therefore in settings there is an option to turn that off. So low profile mobile handsets can turn off Auto search to type quickly. You will see a Dictionary icon on the notification bar to start the app quickly. On sharing text you will find the Kannada Dictionary. This will be helpful to find out the meaning of any word. Features of the Dictionary: • Kannada To English • English To Kannada • No internet connection required • Search From Web • Search by Sharing • Auto Suggestion • Pronounce & Voice Search • Antonyms (Opposite words) • Synonyms • Backup and Restore • History & Study Plan • Word Game • Share Words • Copy Words
release_text: • Voice search bug fixed • Auto language detection re-enabled • Word of the day added (Up to 5 words in a day) • Antonyms added • Banner ad removed to increase display area for content • Kannada transliteration added. • Now you can backup study plan, history and added words in a file and restore on any device using that file. • New words added. • Built in Kannada Keyboard added. • On sharing text you will find Kannada Dictionary. This will be helpful to find out meaning of any word.

description: 【祝！両OS累計30万ダウンロード突破！】 『もったいないをなくしたい！』 あなたの不要品を誰かにあげれば『豪華景品』がもらえる！ 無料で商品をあげる、もらえるフリマアプリ『Garagesale(ガレージセール)』です 「捨てるのはもったいない」そんなモノはどんどん誰かにあげちゃおう！ ※このアプリの開発者は、安心・安全なアプリの開発者であるとしてアンドロイダーの公認デベロッパーに認証されています。 https://androider.jp/developer/0c00e025182be8c9682b8bfa50303648/ 【どんなアプリなの？】 お家に眠っている「捨てるにはもったいないもの」を売ったりあげたり みんなの「もう使わなくなったもの」がもらえるアプリです 中にはびっくりするようなお宝がある可能性も？ 「こんなもの探してます」なんて投稿もできちゃいます →いっぱいあげた人には運営から豪華な景品をプレゼント！ →お部屋の不要品を処分して海外旅行や人気家電をゲットしよう！ 【こんな方におすすめ！】 ・引っ越しをするので不要品を処分したい ・フリマに出品してみたいモノがある ・オークションに出品したことがある ・すでにフリマアプリを使っている ・ガレージセールをした事がある ・ネットショップをしてみたかった ・フリーマーケットで色々見るのが好き ・フリマやオークションで処分できない不要品がある ・売れないからもうタダでも処分したい ・タダでもらえるなら何でも欲しい ・部屋の不要品を断捨離したい ・誰かに「ありがとう」と言われたい ・古着屋やリサイクルショップを巡るのが好き ・リユースやリサイクルに興味がある ・ハンドメイドのアイテムを販売したい ・アプリで出来るフリマを探している ・普通のフリーマーケットにはもう飽きた ・かんたんに決済出来るフリマアプリを探している ・有名ではないけどずっと探しているものがある ・売れるモノは持っていないがあげるモノならある ・知人にあげるのは申し訳ないがネットなら大丈夫 →あげたい方ももらいたい方もみんなで使おう！ 【色々な機能があります！】 ・捨てられないけど処分したい！＝『あげる』 ・これ探してます、誰か持ってる？＝『探してます』 ・あげるのはもったいない！＝『売ります』 ・値段付けるのめんどくさい！＝『おまかせ価格』 ・お金はいらない、モノが欲しい！＝『交換希望』 ・見て見て、こんなモノ持ってるよ！＝『自慢する』 ・発送めんどくさい…近くで取引！＝『手渡しのみ』 →あなたがしたいことは何でもできちゃいます！ 【決済方法は自由に選択！】 ・信頼できる相手とだったら『直接決済』 ・詐欺は怖い、そんな時は『あんしん決済』 →あんしん決済はクレジットカード／コンビニ／ＡＴＭ／キャリア決済／ポイントからお選び頂けます！ 【利用方法について】 ・Garagesale(ガレージセール)は基本『無料』でご利用可能です ■出品時に発生する手数料 ・『あげる』『探してます』『交換希望』『自慢する』『手渡しのみ』 取引が成立した場合でも手数料は発生しません ・『売ります』『おまかせ価格』 取引が成立した際に、商品価格の8.99％が売買手数料として発生します ■購入時に発生する手数料 ・『あげる』商品をもらう場合『モラーウ』が必要となります ※モラーウは毎日ログインするなど色々な方法で獲得可能です！ ・あんしん決済をご利用の場合、決済方法に応じて手数料が変わります ■ポイント換金時に発生する手数料 ・ご申請1回につき250円の手数料が発生します ※これらの手数料はサービスを維持するために必要最低限なものとなります 　誠に恐れ入りますがご理解頂きますようお願いいたします 【その他】 ・一部の機能についてはPCサイト（ http://gsale.me/ ）からのみご利用が可能です ・有料の月額会員に登録する事でより多くの機能を使えるようになります ご利用された方々のご意見を参考に良い使いやすいサービスにしていきます！ ご要望・ご質問・不具合などはお問い合わせフォームよりご連絡下さい また、問題が発生した場合はエラーレポートの送信をお願いいたします [congratulation! description: 殿下は人工無脳アプリです。 人工無脳とは、知能を持たない会話プログラム。 ”知性らしきもの”、”人間性のようなもの”が宿ることを願って殿下と名付けました。 ときに”人間”と話しているかのような不思議な感覚を楽しんでください。 ※ちゅうい 殿下は空気を読まず自由奔放に発言します。 気分を害する恐れがあるので、繊細な方はインストールを慎重にご検討ください。 ■操作 ▼メイン画面 殿下に話しかける。 ・メッセージウィンドウに文字を入力し、送信ボタンを押してください。 ▼会話履歴画面（メイン画面からスワイプ操作で遷移） テキストをタップするとコピーできます。 右下のアイコンをタップすると、コピーしたテキストをペーストできるメディアが表示されます。 ▼メニュー画面（メイン画面からスワイプ操作で遷移） 設定ができます。 このアプリの開発者は、安心・安全なアプリの開発者であるとしてアンドロイダーの公認デベロッパーに認証されています。 https://androider.jp/developer/0b50c000d13fa84d280b1ad950296b6c/ His Royal Highness is no artificial brain app. Artificial no brain, conversation programs that do not have intelligence. It was named Prince in the hope that "something like human nature", "what looks like intelligence" dwells. Please enjoy the strange sensation as if talking with "human" when. ※ Note His Royal Highness when you speak with wild abandon and without reading the air. Because there is fear offend, please consider carefully the installation the more delicate. ■ Operation ▼ main screen I talk to His Royal Highness. • Enter the characters in the message window, please press the send button. ▼ (transition swiping from the main screen) conversation history screen You can copy when you tap the text. When you tap the icon in the lower right, the media that you can paste the copied text will be displayed. ▼ (transition swiping from the main screen) menu screen I can set. The developer of this app has been certified to the official developers of andro riders as a developer of a safe and secure app. https://androider.jp/developer/0b50c000d13fa84d280b1ad950296b6c/

description: *** Ranked in top 50 Learning Apps by news.com.au *** *** Rated "Exceptional" by App User Magazine *** Colorful characters teach your child their lowercase letters and alphabet song in an irresistible way! Does your child love to tickle bunnies or chomp on cookies? This app lets your child do both! Transform “d” into a dog that barks, or turn the letter “i” into an ice cream cone, then add the cherry! Hear silly sounds, poke objects, and sing along! Your child will squeal with laughter while playing with the letters in “abc WOW!” The “abc WOW!” app makes innovations on early learning and child development using letter to object recognition. Designed with a kindergarten teacher’s guidance, “abc WOW!” teaches the lowercase letters--the letters most used for reading and writing. Objects shaped like their beginning letter magically appear, making a natural and intuitive bond between the letter shape, name, and usage. Fun music, vibrant artwork, captivating sound effects, and delightful animations make gameplay irresistible. This interactive app makes learning fun for all children learning their letters and sounds. Keywords: Kids, ABC, ABCs, Letters, Reading, Educational, Child, Children, Games, Preschool, Preschool-aged, alphabet, game, learning, teaching apps for kids, baby, toddler, flashcards, pronunciation, abcd, kid, Child, School, Kindergarten, Phonics, Reading
release_text: • Added a new game, "Find the Letter!" • Improved UI throughout • Bug fixes

description: Jiffy is a time tracker designed for streamlined work time tracking, allowing you to spend a minimum amount of time, but at the same time generate accurate an time sheet. Jiffy's beauty is in its simplicity, it’s like having a stopwatch on your phone or tablet for all the jobs that you need to track. Keeps track of your work time Track work for all of your customers, projects and tasks in one beautifully designed app. Switch effortlessly between projects as your workday progresses. Supports you when you forgot Jiffy makes it easy to modify and edit entries. Our innovative smart suggestions help you set the start and stop times accurately. Presents your time in a gorgeous summary Simple yet powerful reports of the time you have logged, grouped by customer, project or task. View reports by Year, Month, Week day or even custom time range. Export your time sheet for use in other applications. Close at hand Access your projects easily from your lock or home screen with the widget. See tracking in progress through interactive notification. No account required You don’t need to create yet another account to use Jiffy. Just download it and get started right away “Your time is valuable, so don’t waste it. This app tracks how long you spend on certain tasks and displays it in a clean, pie-chart stylee.” - T3.com, Best Android apps 2013 “Jiffy does a great job of making it easy to plan out your days and weeks in a way that couldn’t be easier to keep track of.” - Businessinsider.com, The 12 Best-Looking Apps On Android In-app extensions: Unlimited History & Projects - Unlocks the limitation of max 3 projects and 3 weeks of history Unlimited JiffyTags - Unlocks the limitation of max 3 connected tags (NFC) To learn more about Jiffy’s permission usage, see http://www.jiffy.nu/permissions Join us at https://plus.google.com/communities/113117469076376701846 to participate in discussions about support or new features. Logging time and creating time sheets has never been easier. Try Jiffy now, it is free to try and does not require a user account. Awarded first place in 'Best of Swiss apps, Productivity'
release_text: Fix for non-US characters in project names when synchronizing

description: Listen to audio books and music through your phone's earpiece when you don't have earphones handy. Boost your audio (Android 2.3 through 4.1 or so only, not working on 4.2.1 or higher), whether through earpiece or through the speaker. Earpiece is a simple, light-weight audio-control app. You can pop Earpiece up on top of another application simply by holding down the SEARCH key. In the options, you can enable an experimental feature which switches the phone to speaker phone when it's away from the face and then back to speaker phone close up. This only works on devices with a proximity sensor, of course. Another experimental feature is that you can significantly reduce the volume of the camera sounds on some devices. Ensure your local laws allow you to do this. Earpiece is free and Open Source. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK. Playing audio at high volumes, especially for a prolonged amount of time, can damage speakers and/or hearing. Note 1: There is no affiliation between the developer of Earpiece and the developer of Mortplayer, which is the application shown in the background of the screenshots. Note 2: The reason the application needs permission to read log data is for the camera quieting feature. When the camera quieting feature is active, Earpiece monitors the log for when the camera is about to take a picture and then quiets things for about two seconds. If you are worried about privacy issues, or otherwise curious, you can look at the full Earpiece source code at github.com/arpruss/earpiece and you can build it from source yourself. Note 3: If you use Earpiece, don't use my Speaker Boost with it--just use Earpiece's audio boost option instead.
release_text: 1.11: bug fixes 1.10: Lollipop support 1.09: Click outside to exit (Android 3.0+); on-boot fix 1.07.2: Some devices need bluetooth permission--I added it 1.07: Fix crash in Settings under Android 4.x 1.06: By default limit speaker boost to 60% (even that can be dangerous). This can be changed in Earpiece Settings. 1.05.1: Improve camera quieting; improve screen layout 1.05: Experimental feature: make camera sounds quieter on some devices 1.04: No ad, auto speaker phone, non-uniform boost

description: ♥ Fireflies Live Wallpaper ♥ is a brand new app for your mobile. Lightning bugs....Have you ever wondered about the small, blinking creatures that light up summer nights? Can there be a more adorable insect than a firefly? If summertime is one of your favorite times of the year, with the backyard fires, warm moonlit nights, and fireflies all around. What you need is a picture of a gorgeous firefly on your screen. Most people like them because they are pretty and graceful. This beautiful high resolution “Fireflies Live Wallpaper” photos show you beautiful fireflies appearing and disappearing in the night sky. Get the best app for your new Android™ mobile. Follow the installation instructions: Home ➤ Menu ➤Wallpapers ➤ Live Wallpapers • Includes different animated wallpapers. • Very easy to use just tap once to preview the background image and hold to set the background. • Set as wallpaper or as screen saver, horizontal orientation is fully supported. • HD wallpapers compatible with 99% mobile devices. • Optimized battery usage, supported sleep mode. • Completely free wallpaper for your screen. • Wonderful 3D wallpaper is just a click away from you. What’s more magical than a firefly light show on a warm summer night? Now you don’t have to catch fireflies and keep them in a jar for only a day or two before you need to set them free. Download ♥ Fire flies Live Wallpaper ♥ and you will have small fireflies appearing and disappearing on your phone screen. These small insects are extremely interesting. Firefly light can be yellow, green or orange. Find ♥ Fireflies Live Wallpaper ♥ on app store and download it right now. Get this breathtaking “firefly wallpaper” which is brand new on the market, and enjoy the beauty of nature with these stunning fireflies. Share free wallpapers with your friends and family and enjoy beautiful “fireflies pictures” on your phone screen! Download ♥ Fire flies Live Wallpaper ♥ awesome app and enjoy the summer time. Find your favorite picture of gorgeous fireflies and beautify your phone screen. A familiar sight on hot summer nights, each firefly flashes its light in a pattern unique to its subspecies. Just imagine such a wonderful sight. Wait no more, wonderful firefly images are a click away from you! Download ♥ Fireflies Live Wallpaper ♥ and see gorgeous “fire fly” flying across your phone screen. Beautiful fire fly “live wallpaper” is waiting for you. These beautiful fireflies pictures can be a perfect gift for your best friend who adores small fireflies. Fireflies, or “Lightning Bugs”, are one of the wonders of nature. Watching them flicker and flash brings smiles to people of all ages. In the late evening the firefly will flash a yellowish light to communicate with other fireflies. In some places at some times, fireflies synchronize their flashing and now you will have a chance to see it on your screen. Download ♥ Fireflies Live Wallpaper ♥ and enjoy. If you like to watch them as they dance and fly around with flair, to see them flash a ray of light coming from their derriere get this free app as soon as possible. Fireflies are most beloved insects of many people around the world! Fireflies are lucky, they fly where ever they want to go and always bright. A hundred little Fireflies will be peering through your screen everyone will wonder where they came from. *Android™ is a trademark of Google Inc. *This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by Samsung.

description: NPO Radio 1 is dé nieuws- en sportzender van de publieke omroep. Zeven dagen in de week, 24 uur per dag, de snelste nieuwsvoorziening. Belangrijkste evenement: Sportzomer. NPO Radio 1 - Het nieuws van alle kanten. ____________________ Android 4.0 en ouder: Er is helaas beperkte of geen ondersteuning voor het afspelen van video's en het ontvangen van notificaties. Feedback: Problemen of suggesties voor verdere ontwikkeling ontvangen we bij voorkeur via de feedback optie in het keuzemenu van de app. Camera/microfoon: De app kan gebruikmaken van de camera en microfoon om een foto, video of audio-opname te maken die gedeeld kan worden met de redactie. Dit gebeurt alleen op verzoek van de gebruiker bij een specifieke actie. Locatiebepaling: Bij deelname aan sommige zenderacties kan het nodig zijn om locatiebepaling en/of bluetooth te activeren. Dit gebeurt alleen nadat een gebruiker hiervoor apart toestemming heeft gegeven bij die specifieke actie. Identiteit: Om notificaties te kunnen ontvangen is identificatie via een account vereist. Wachtwoorden worden niet met ons gedeeld. Dataverbruik: De radiozenders worden ontvangen via een internetverbinding. Via Wi-Fi zijn hier doorgaans geen kosten aan verbonden, maar bij ander gebruik van mobiel internet, zoals 3G, kunnen kosten in rekening worden gebracht. Het dataverbruik is voor eigen risico en het is aan te raden om dit in de gaten te houden. Privacy en voorwaarden: Er worden cookies geplaatst om gebruik te meten. Met installatie van de applicatie wordt hiermee akkoord gegaan. (c) 2016 NPO NPO Radio 1 is the news and sports channel of the public broadcaster. Seven days a week, 24 hours a day, the fastest news. Main event: Sport Summer. NPO Radio 1 - The news from all sides. ____________________ Android 4.0 and above: Unfortunately there is limited or no support for video playback and receiving notifications.   Feedback: Problems or suggestions for future development, we receive preferably via the feedback option in the menu of the app. Camera / microphone: The app can use the camera and microphone to take a picture, video or audio recording that can be shared with the editors. This occurs only at the request of the user for a specific action. Localization: When participating in some transmitter actions it may be necessary to activate location determination and / or bluetooth. This only happens after a user has given special permission for that particular action. Identity: To receive notifications via an account identifier is required. Passwords are not shared with us. Data usage: The radio stations are received via an Internet connection. Wi-Fi here are usually no charges, but other mobile internet usage, such as 3G, costs can be charged. The data usage is at your own risk and it is advisable to keep this in mind. Privacy and conditions: Cookies are placed to measure usage. With installation of the application is agreed. (c) 2016 NPO

description: Do you like Bomberman, Dynablaster or similar arcade games? Try Firelords! FireLords is fast action game with literally explosive gameplay. *** This is free version with Ads. If you don't like ads, consider buying full version. Thanks :) *** --- DroidGamers.com --- "Bomberman style game FireLords HD explodes onto Google Play" --- AndroidPolice.com --- "Need some Bomberman-inspired action with a more serious feel?" --- AndroidZoom.com --- "FireLords - Medieval bomberman" ★ INSTRUCTIONS - READ FIRST :-) ★ ✓ Touch on right half of the screen to move the hero and on left half of the screen to place the bomb. ✓ Alternatively activate TILT control on main menu screen. Then you can tilt your device to move the hero and touch anywhere on screen to place a bomb. ★ FEATURES ★ ✓ Smart enemies - with variable behaviour and intelligence ✓ Four episode packs - enjoy beautiful HD graphics and unique gameplay factors in each episode ✓ More than 40 levels - including 5 secret ones. Will you be able to find them all? ✓ Gameplay innovations - bonuses (speed, bombs, range, shield, ...), black fog, explosive barrels, destroyable ground ✓ Days of fun - play the levels again to get another unique experience and earn more stars to unlock new episodes, find secret levels ✓ Precise control - whether you prefer using your accelerometer/g-sensor for TILT control or on-screen joystick (d-pad), we have worked hard to implement the best possible response ★ TIPS ★ - See gameplay video how to control the on-screen joystick best. - You can disable TILT control on main menu screen (middle button) and switch between left/right halves of the screen (right button) if you prefer to place the bombs with right hand and move the hero with left hand. - Want to gain more stars from the levels? Try to destroy all the boxes (you might find entrance to secret level as well ;)) and try to earn more score by combos - destroy at least 2 boxes at once or kill at least 2 enemies at once. ★ RATE US 5 STARS PLEASE if you like our work and want to see more levels in upcoming updates! ★ ★ We would love to hear your feedback - please write us to info@playito.com if you are having any issues or have comments or ideas for our game! Suggestions so far include multiplayer over Wi-Fi/internet, freemium version, level editor... ★ ★ Visit our website for more information about the game: http://playito.com/firelords/ ★

description: Материалы для подготовки к ОГЭ (ГИА-9) 2015 по русскому языку рекомендованы ИСМО Российской Академии Образования для подготовки выпускников всех типов образовательных учреждений РФ к сдаче экзаменов в форме ОГЭ (ГИА-9) 2015.   Материалы созданы Егораевой Галиной Тимофеевной - практикующим преподавателем, имеющим многолетний успешный опыт работы по подготовке учеников к ОГЭ (ГИА-9) 2015 и ЕГЭ, ее многочисленные пособия широко используются учителями русского языка во всех регионах России. В приложении есть типовые варианты экзаменационных работ 2014 года, которые сопровождаются инструкциями по выполнению работы, ответами ко всем заданиям и критериями оценивания заданий части С. Ценным дополнением является подробный разбор всех заданий и тестов, а также задания на подготовку к анализу текста (выявлению различных грамматических явлений). Материалы предполагают два режима работы: 1. Режим «Экзамен» - условия выполнения заданий максимально приближены к реальной обстановке на экзамене. 2. Режим «Тестирование» - предполагает возможность тренироваться, исправлять ответы, сверять свои решения с правильными ответами. Выполнение всех заданий гарантирует выработку устойчивых навыков безошибочных действий на экзамене, решения заданий базового, повышенного и высокого уровней сложности. Учащийся, справившийся со всеми предлагаемыми заданиями, может с уверенностью считать себя готовым к экзамену по русскому языку. Предлагаемые материалы избавят Вас от необходимости покупать множество книг и искать дополнительную информацию в Интернете! Компании «Экзамен-Медиа» очень важно Ваше мнение о представленных учебных материалах! Мы ждем Ваших замечаний и отзывов о нашей работе и будем рады выполнить Ваши пожелания. + Полностью обновлено содержание экзаменационных работ. + Изменилась структура работы. + Изменилась система оценивания заданий. + Изменилось количество заданий и порядок их нумерации. + Оформление приведено в соответствие с новым содержанием. Materials to prepare for the OGE (DPA-9) in 2015 on the Russian language recommended Ismo Russian Academy of Education to prepare graduates of all types of educational institutions of the Russian Federation for exams in the form of OGE (DPA-9) in 2015. Materials created Egoraevoy Galina VT - practicing teachers with many years of successful experience in preparing students for the OGE (DPA-9) 2015 and the exam, its many benefits are widely used by teachers of the Russian language in all regions of Russia. The application has typical embodiments of the examination papers in 2014, which are accompanied by instructions for the implementation of the work, the answer to all assignments and assessment criteria of the job C. valuable addition is the detailed analysis of all assignments and tests, as well as job training to the analysis of the text (identifying different grammatical phenomena). Materials suggest two modes of operation: 1. Mode "Exam" - terms of assignments as close to the real situation on the exam. 2. Mode "Testing" - an opportunity to train, correct answers, compare their solutions with the correct answers. Performing all tasks guarantee an error-free sustainable skills in the exam solutions jobs base, enhanced, or high levels of complexity. Student cope with all the proposed assignment may, with the Confidence consider yourself ready for the exam in the Russian language. Suggested materials save you from having to buy a lot books and look for more information on the Web! Of "Exam-Media" is very important to an opinion on education materials! We welcome your comments and feedback about our work and we happy to fulfill your wishes. + Fully updated contents of the examination papers. + Changed the structure of the work. + Modify job evaluation system. + Modify the number of jobs and the order of their numbering. + Making brought into line with the new content.

Recruit a small army of stretchy Squids and lead them into turn-based battles against the dark hordes. description: The first mobile game for kids to learn spoken mandarin. Kids can learn Chinese by playing Sun Wukong in the game, using magic spells to beat enemies. When casting a magic spell, kids must speak the magic word (Chinese words) aloud to the phone. If the pronunciation is accept, the magic spell will be successfully casted, and the magic effects will happen, -- in most cases, enemies are destroyed. To play the game, you must install a voice recognition package, we suggest the Google Voice Search. If you want the synthetic voice output, you must install a text to speech package which supports Chinese output. Features of this kids mandarin game: There are 41 levels in the game, each level has different tasks and puzzles. Children must speak Chinese to pass these levels. The words are grouped by Pinyin. It may help kids to learn how to pronounce other words with same Pinyin. Here is the link http://benbeninfo.com/games/learning-guide/ for additional learning materials. Providing a game scenario for kids to speak mandarin, to stimulate kids' interesting in learning Chinese. Player’s speech is automatically judged by voice recognizing software. You can know your speech capacity immediately. Learning to speak Chinese is no longer a boring task, you can using spoken Chinese to trigger magic, pass game levels, and get achievements. Many daily objects become magic spells in this kids learn mandarin game, kids may learn these words, and understand how to pronounce. Kids can learn many animals' Chinese name, and knowledge about food-chain in nature. Learning mandarin during fights in the fantasy world. Collecting dragon balls, to transform Sun Wukong in to the most powerful Chinese long. Children can challenge bosses by magic spells, and improving spoken mandarin in this kid mandarin game. If you think this kids learn Chinese game is useful, please consider buying the Ad. free version You are welcomed to contact us if you have any question about the game. Changed the name from "XiYouJi ZhouYuLiLiang" to "Kid mandarin Game" to make it easy for customers to find this speaking Chinese game.
release_text: Total 41 levels. The game will show recognition result by default. So that user can know what their voice sounds like. More levels to play, and more Chinese words for kids to learn.

description: Citrix GoToAssist (Remote Support) gives you the freedom to quickly and easily deliver remote support to desktops and mobile devices from your favorite Android phone or tablet — anywhere and anytime! Support your customers 24/7 when and where they need help. Features • On-demand remote support (unlimited use from your Android device) • Intuitive touch and gesture controls • 400% zoom to see details and operate with precision • Multitasking • Full keyboard functionality (including special keys Alt, Ctrl, and Tab) • Preview text mode for fast typing • Works seamlessly with existing firewalls - no need for special configuration • 128-bit AES encryption, dual passwords and end-to-end user authentication • Connects over 3G and Wi-Fi • Free 24/7 support New to GoToAssist Remote Support? Download the free app from Google Play and click on "Create Account" at the login screen to provide unlimited live support sessions for free! Already have a GoToAssist Remote Support account? Log in with your existing credentials to access your account and connect to your unattended machines as well. HOW TO GET STARTED 1) Download and install the GoToAssist app from Google Play on your Android device. 2) Log in with your GoToAssist credentials. 3) Once logged in, tap on device screen to create a support session when instructed to and have your user go to www.fastsupport.com and enter the remote support ID for your support session or send them an invitation to connect via email. Your user accepts the connection and you can begin to provide remote support. ***** Simple • Instantly connect to users and their devices to solve problems quickly by directly controlling their computer with the intuitive multi-touch display. • Start a remote support session directly from your Android device. Convenient • Provide remote support from your Android device quickly and easily. Once the app is installed, enter your existing account credentials and start a support session. • You can be in the office even when you’re out of the office. With GoToAssist for Android you can connect and resolve technical issues from your favorite Android device to any Mac® or PC. Reliable • GoToAssist for Android comes with free 24/7 Global Customer Support, so you’re never left hanging. • GoToAssist for Android is backed by Citrix, so you can count on this app working when you need it. REQUIREMENTS This version of GoToAssist has been certified on the following devices: • Samsung Galaxy S6 • Samsung Galaxy S5 • Samsung Galaxy S4 • Samsung Galaxy S3 • Samsung Galaxy Note 3 • Samsung Galaxy Pro • Asus Nexus 7 • LG Nexus 5 • Droid Razr • HTC One • Motorola Xoom This version of GoToAssist should be compatible with most devices that meet the following general requirements: • Android OS 4.x or newer Remote Computers: • Internet connection • Windows® 7, Vista, 2003 server or XP • Mac OS® X v10.5 (Leopard) or newer • Internet Explorer® 7.0 or newer, Firefox® 3.5 or newer or Safari™ 3.0 or newer

description: LINE reshapes communication around the globe, bringing you closer to your family, friends, and loved ones—for free. With voice and video calls, messages, and a limitless variety of exciting stickers, you’ll be able to express yourself in ways that you’ve never thought possible. With over 600 million users worldwide, LINE’s constantly expanding platform will continue to provide exciting new experiences and convenience. ▷ LINE’s New Features - Make Group Calls with 200 People Try our group call feature with members in chats. - Keep Your Things Close with Keep Store messages, photos, and videos in Keep and share them easily with friends. ▷ LINE’s Main Features - Free voice and video calls: Use your PC or smartphone to keep in touch with friends and family both at home and abroad, or hold a business meeting on the go! - Instant messaging anywhere: Conversation is just a tap away. Spice it up with LINE’s exciting collection of stickers or send pictures, videos, and even GPS coordinates to let your friends know what you’re up to. - A full-featured social networking service: Post your day-to-day activities to your Timeline or comment on your friends’ posts. - Group chats: Share important information with your co-workers or talk about mutual interests with your closest friends. - Find new expressions in the Sticker Shop: The world’s largest collection of stickers features famous and unique characters from around the world to let you express yourself just the way you want to. - Stay informed with LINE official accounts: Connect directly with your favorite celebrities and companies by friending their official accounts. - Get connected to new apps: LINE provides a gateway to entertainment and lifestyle apps that will keep you entertained and bring new convenience to your life. - Make international calls with LINE Out: Make international calls to mobile phones and landlines at competitively low rates. You can even call friends who aren't LINE users (available in certain countries only). We recommend that you use LINE with Android OS versions 4.0.3 and above. description: Aniways is a Telegram client that offers creative and fun intelligent content (Emoticons, Gifs, Places)! Forget the boring smileys, inconvenience of searching for emotions and lack of icon variety. Anyways technology analyzes your text and highlights key words and phrases that can easily be replaced by emoticons and animated gifs! We also allow you to find relevant places nearby. Aniways quickly finds the best content for your text. Just click on the highlighted words and choose from our multiple suggestions that pop up! Select your favorite and enjoy an easy, beautiful and fun conversation. Why Aniways? - Eliminate time searching for relevant emoticons and Gifs - Make conversations creative, funny and amusing with our ( beautifully designed ) original emoticons! - Over 1,000 emoticons/animations to choose from our on demand component/collection - Find places nearby that are relevant to the conversation Our client is based on the official Telegram app (with source code here: https://github.com/DrKLO/Telegram ), which we’ve modified to use our Contextual content SDK. Our fork is here: https://github.com/Aniways/Telegram Telegram is a messaging app with a focus on speed and security. It's superfast, simple and free! Aniways is a Contextual content SDK which can greatly enhance any messaging app, offering cutting edge UX and new Monetization options. Find out more here: http://www.aniways.com
release_text: --Fixed bug where messages displayed "Welcome to the Web application of Aniways Messenger" --Message forwarding working again :) --Emotions keyboard doesn't hide navigation menu buttons --Better mapping between phrases and content --Various other bug Fixes and UI improvements

description: Parker shows you where open parking spaces are right now in more than 30 cities and universities in the US and the UK, while also giving you access to information for over 24,000 parking lots and garages. Simply select a street with available spots or garage on the map and get turn-by-turn voice navigation. You'll also get instant access to prices, payment options, and hours. Up to the minute parking availability is offered in Los Angeles, Hollywood, Boston, Venice Beach, Studio City, Indianapolis, Reno, Fort Lauderdale and Ellicott City MD, as well as at Clemson University and Oregon State University, with more on the way. To see a longer list, scroll below. Features of Parker include: - Find open parking spots, and even see on which side of the street you’ll find them - Use filters to only show spots that meet your preferences. (No coins? Not a problem – we can show you where bills or credit cards are accepted; Need accessible parking? We can show you availability for that, too.) - View prices, payment options, hours (i.e., street parking free after 7PM), and more - One touch, turn-by-turn voice navigation quickly directs you to your preferred parking location - Built-in timer reminds you when your meter is about to expire - “Walk-to-Car” provides directions back to your car - View traffic conditions en route to your destination Up to the minute parking information for locations including… Birmingham, UK Boston, MA Capitola, CA Case Western Reserve University, OH Clemson University Cleveland, OH Ellicott City, MD Fort Lauderdale, FL Hollywood Indianapolis, IN Jacksonville, FL Los Angeles, CA Manchester, UK New York City - The Bronx, Roosevelt Island New Brunswick, NJ Oregon State University Redwood City, CA Reno, NV San Carlos, CA San Mateo, CA Studio City, CA University of Maryland, College Park Vancouver, WA Venice Beach, CA Washington D.C.

description: Está aplicación te permitirá saber prácticamente todo sobre el idioma francés. El curso se imparte en 63 lecciones, cada una de ellas explicada mediante un vídeo. La dificultad aumenta de forma gradual desde el nivel más básico hasta un nivel avanzado. La aplicación también incluye la opción de fijar marcadores. Éstos te permitirán poner un marcador en cualquier instante de tiempo dentro de un vídeo. Por ejemplo, si nos resulta difícil entender un tema que está en el minuto 2 de un vídeo, simplemente nos ubicamos en ese instante dentro del vídeo y presionamos el botón de marcador. Automáticamente se creará un marcador a través del cual accederemos a ese instante del vídeo cuando queramos y las veces que queramos. This application lets you know virtually everything about the French language. The course is taught in 63 lessons, each explained in a video. The difficulty increases gradually from the most basic to advanced level. The application also includes the option to set markers. These allow you to place a bookmark at any instant of time within a video. For example, if you have difficulty understanding a topic that is in the 2nd minute of a video, simply we are in that moment in the video and press the bookmark button. This will create a marker by which will get to that point of the video when we want and as often as you want.

description: Atom Launcher allows you to use your Android Smartphone more easily and conveniently. Atom Launcher provides various services such as user settings on Home screen and application, or decoration settings with trendy theme. Enjoy newer, smarter Android life with Atom Launcher. ▶ Main Features -Theme Maker: Easy way to make my own Atom theme with my gallery and theme images. - Atom Bar: Google search, digital clock, clock + Quick Setting, clock + Google Search - Streamlined Widgets: Memory Cleaner, Flash, Clock, Memo Calendar, Quick Setting, Contacts - Gestures: Easy controlling through Swipe up/Swipe down/Double tap gestures - Edit tray: Simple and easy management of applications with a quick and easy edit mode. - Smart Folders: Supports customizable folders on your home screen. You can resize folders and directly launch without opening the folder. - Dock Bar: Access up to 20 of your favorite apps instantly. - Hiding Dock: Home screen Lock / Filter effects / Screen switching effects / Transparency settings - Icon Customization: Mix and match icons and gallery images among themes. - Icon Setting: Size control / Name Hiding / Naming color changing - Point Color Change: The color of Atom bar, menu icon, and guideline can be changed with color picker. - App Grids: Home screen size to max of 6*6 / All apps screen to max of 5*6. (More divided grid is available according to the amount of Apps visible.) - Home Screen Copy: Bring the home screen you have set up in another launcher over to Atom Launcher. - Hiding Apps: Hiding the installed applications. (When you search the apps on All Apps, hidden apps can be found). - Backup / Restore Settings: Backs up your settings with up to three different themes and icon sets. - Multi Languages: Korean, English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese ▶ Tips - You can combine the photos in your gallery with Atom icons to use as a theme - You can move, make folder, delete, and hide apps all together by Tray feature while in Edit mode - Sliding up/down gesture feature on Atom bar, home screen and dock bar. - Memory cleaner and flash 1x1 size widget. - Atom Menu provides Atom’s various menus as icons. ▶ Atom Family App ☆ All in One Widget Provided Widgets - Memo, Monthly Calendar, Daily Calendar, Quick Settings, Contacts, Search Bar, Digital Clock, and Analog Clock. ☆ Atom Store The new themes, icon pack and widgets are updated every week from sophisticated, simple theme to hand drawing of famous illustrators. (Try searching All in One Widgets/ Atom Store!) ▶PLEASE READ - Available for Android OS version 4.0.2 and above. - Requires 20 MB of space to save theme resources. - The application’s icon don’t appear to enhance usability - Badges: Display missed call, unread messages (ATOM only supports default apps on your Android device, does not support device-specific functions) - Due to resolution issues, service is currently inactive for “Optimus View” - Certain manufacturers’ default widgets don’t appear on Atom Launcher, due to compatibility issues ▶Customer Support Please leave us reviews of the application. (Five stars reviews are really helpful to us ) If you have any comments, ideas or feedback, please leave a review or send an email. - CS mail: cs@dlto.co.kr - Blog: http://blog.naver.com/atomlauncher - Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Atom.Home

description: Vuoi tenere sotto controllo il tuo piano dati e verificare quanto traffico consuma ciascuna app? Sei sicuro che tutti i dati personali a cui le app hanno accesso servano davvero? Hai delle applicazioni che non usi da tempo? TIM Checkapp è il cruscotto all-in-one che mostra quanta percentuale del tuo piano dati hai consumato nel mese, quanti dati consuma ciascuna applicazione e segnala le app che accedono a molti dati personali e fornisce lo score globale della tua privacy. Da oggi TIM Checkapp è ancora più semplice ed immediato. Permette di configurare il piano dati e mostra in un’unica schermata il consumo e il livello medio della tua privacy. Infatti, classifica le tue app in base a quanto sono invasive della tua privacy oltre a segnalare quelle che usi di più e quelle che usi di meno e che, forse, non ti servono più. Con TIM CheckApp puoi visualizzare: • Il traffico dati sviluppato da ciascuna applicazione (sia su rete 3G che su rete WiFi) misurata sul periodo di un giorno, una settimana o un mese • Il livello globale di condivisione dei tuoi dati personali calcolato tramite un algoritmo sviluppato da TIM • Tutte le applicazioni installate sul telefono • La quantità di dati personali a cui ciascuna applicazione ha accesso e valutarne l’adeguatezza rispetto alla funzione dell’app • Le applicazioni che hanno accesso al maggior numero di dati personali • Le applicazioni in esecuzione: Puoi arrestare quelle che ritieni non importanti e migliorare le prestazioni del tuo telefono Il traffico dati indicato è misurato sul terminale e potrebbe differire da quello misurato sulla rete. Per ottenere il consumo mensile di traffico scarica l’app del 119 o consulta il sito www.tim.it. Per informazioni e suggerimenti scrivici su timcheckapp@telecomitalia.it Want to keep tabs on your data plan and check how much traffic each app consumes? Are you sure that all the personal data to which apps have access to really serve? You have applications that do not use for a long time? TIM Checkapp is the all-in-one dashboard that shows how much of your data plan you have consumed during the month, how much data each application consumes and noted many apps that access personal data and provides the overall score of your privacy. From today TIM Checkapp is even more simple and easy. Allows you to configure the data plane and show a single screen consumption and the average level of your privacy. In fact, rank your apps based on what are invasive of your privacy as well as those who report using more and those that use less and that, perhaps, you do not need any more. By TIM CheckApp you can: • The traffic data developed by each application (both on 3G and on WiFi network) measured over the period of a day, a week or a month • The overall level of sharing of your personal data calculated using an algorithm developed by TIM • All applications installed on your phone • The amount of data that each application has access, and assess their adequacy with respect to the function of the app • Applications that have access to the greatest number of personal data • Applications running: You can not stop those who feel important and enhance the performance of your phone The traffic data shown is measured at the terminal and may differ from that measured on the network. To get the monthly consumption of 119 traffic download the app or visit the website www.tim.it. For information and suggestions write us on timcheckapp@telecomitalia.it
release_text: 2.0.580 - Interfaccia grafica completamente ridisegnata per un accesso ancora più immediato alle informazioni “vitali” - È possibile configurare il piano dati per controllare l’avanzamento del consumo nel mese o nella settimana: mai più byte inutilizzati 1.3.486 - Risoluzione di malfunzionamenti per alcuni modelli di terminali 1.2.475 - Dettaglio delle statistiche di traffico per singola app - Miglioramento delle performance

description: Проведите время с удовольствием и пользой вместе с классической игрой "Составь слова", так же известной как "Слова из слова", "Составление слов из слова" и "Наборщик". Это одна из самых популярных интеллектуальных словесных игр! Правила игры очень просты: дается исходное слово, из букв которого нужно составить другие слова. При этом допускаются только имена существительные единственного числа в именительном падеже (исключая имена собственные). Игроки, добивающиеся лучших результатов в этой игре, отличаются прекрасной эрудицией и развитыми комбинаторными навыками – ведь вам приходится перебирать множество различных буквенных комбинаций. Одним из основных качеств хорошего игрока здесь является умение строить анаграммы – слова, составленные из всех букв заданного слова. Эта игра состоит из уровней, каждый уровень - это новое слово. Составляя слова из слова, вы набираете очки - каждая буква составленного слова, это одно очко. Допустим если вы открыли слово "вокзал", вы получите сразу 6 очков, а открыв слово "кит", всего 3 очка. Набирая достаточное количество очков, вы открываете новые уровни, и тем самым - новые слова! Игра будет постоянно обновляться, и с каждым обновлением будут добавляться новые слова. Если вы любитель таких словесных игр как "Виселица", "Балда", "Словобор", сканвордов, ребусов и прочих головоломок, то эта игра - для вас! В данной игре все слова проверены, и были исключены все нецензурные, неприличные и жаргонные слова, что бы вы могли не опасаться, если играете со своим ребенком. Spend time with pleasure and with the classic game of "Build the words" as well known as the "Word of the word," "Making the words of the word" and "compositor". This is one of the most popular intellectual word games! Game rules are very simple: given the original word, the letters you want to make other words. In this non-singular nouns in the nominative case (excluding proper names). Players who achieve the best results in this game differ fine erudition and developed combinatorial skills - because you have to sort through many different letter combinations. One of the main qualities of a good player here is the ability to construct anagrams - words composed of all the letters of the given word. This game consists of levels, each level - a new word. Composing words of word, you score points - each letter is composed words, this one point. Suppose if you have opened the word "station", once you get 6 points, while opening the word "whale", only 3 points. Gaining enough points, you unlock new levels, and thus - new words! The game will be constantly updated, and with each update will add new words. If you're a fan of word games such as "Hangman", "Balda", "Slovobor" skanvordov, riddles and other puzzles, this game is - for you! In this game all words tested, and were excluded obscene, indecent and slang words that you could not be afraid, if you play with your child.
release_text: - добавлены новые уровни

description: Warning: This game is crammed full of monsters, cake, amazing powers, puzzly bits, epic adventure, witty repartee, secret paths, unlockable characters, silly hats and a wiener dog. Use caution if you are allergic to fun or overly sensitive to cake-related pathos. ADVENTURE… EXCLAMATION POINT! As so many of these things do, it all begins on a magical island. In this case, Gogapoe Island, a place populated by both humans and monsters. What starts out as a mission to get back Niko's birthday cake becomes a quest for the fate of Gogapoe itself. But, ya know, cake is still super important, too! MONSTER MASH-UP! Oodles of friendly monsters will join Niko's quest and use their kooky powers to demolish obstacles and humiliate enemies. Hordes of evil monsters will cause mayhem and generally be jerkfaces, but that's nothing you can't fix with headbutts, frost breath, stink clouds and rainbow barf. EXERCISE YOUR BRAIN MUSCLE! Even with powerful amigos at your side, you're gonna need your thinking cap to get past these cerebrum-tingling environmental puzzles. And did we mention the bonus challenges that give you these really swell stars? You like stars, don't you? IT NEVER HURTS TO HELP! If side quests are your jam, Gogapoe is packed with people—and monsters—in need of roadside assistance. Send a little love their way, and you might discover hidden paths, unlock extra levels or earn unique swag, including special costumes that give Niko nifty powers of his own! SWEET TOUCH CONTROLS! With innovative touch controls so buttery smooth they could grease a cake pan, it's never been easier to manage a crew of big, hairy behemoths. Just draw a path, and they'll follow your instructions to a T, even if you swap to another monster to cue up a different action. ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK BY DISASTERPEACE! The icing on this big ol' cake is 60 sweet minutes of original music written by composer extraordinaire, Disasterpeace. Save the day and fulfill your monstrous cakelust all at once in MONSTERS ATE MY BIRTHDAY CAKE! --------------------------- If you're having any problems with this app, feel free to contact us at advanced.platforms@turner.com . Tell us about the issues you're running into as well as what device and OS version you're using. This app may contain ads for Cartoon Network & our partners’ products & services. PRIVACY INFORMATION: Your privacy is important to us at Cartoon Network, a division of Turner Broadcasting System, Inc. This game collects and uses information as described in Cartoon Network’s Privacy Policy linked below. This information may be used, for example, to respond to user requests; enable users to take advantage of certain features and services; personalize content; serve advertising; perform network communications; manage and improve our products and services; and perform other internal operations of Cartoon Network web sites or online services. Our privacy practices are guided by data privacy laws in the United States. For users residing in the EU or other countries outside the U.S., please note that this app may use persistent identifiers for game management purposes. By downloading this application, you accept our Privacy Policy and End User License Agreement, and you give permission for such uses for all users of your device. The Privacy Policy and End User License Agreement are in addition to any terms, conditions or policies imposed by your wireless carrier and Google Inc. Cartoon Network and its affiliates are not responsible for any collection, use, or disclosure of your personal information by Google or your wireless carrier. Terms of Use: http://www.cartoonnetwork.com/legal/termsofuse.html Privacy Policy: http://www.cartoonnetwork.com/legal/privacy/mobile.html
release_text: Additional polish and tweaks to make this cake as delicious as possible.

description: Use this app and get information about causes, symptom and how to prevent those diseases. Along with that you will get contact details (such as address, phone number etc) of hospital in Bangladesh to make immediate contact with hospital in your nearest area or any other area in Bangladesh. User will also get to know about the season based diseases, their causes, prevention and cure in details. For example: Usually in the rainy season, the number of patients of dengue fever increases. Four tabs for different diseases, symptoms, prevention & cure and services have been incorporated in the opening screen. User will get relevant information under the option tabs shown. Service option provides information about doctors and hospital so that users can immediately contact with doctor or hospital in any emergency case.

Write us an email and we will soon help you in any bugfixing or problem. Thanks ____________________

description: ## PREVIOUSLY KNOWN AS SLEEPY BABY, NAME CHANGED FOR LEGAL REASONS ## This app turns your Android phone into a baby mobile / noise maker. Choose to play Lullabies, White Noise, or Nature Sounds to sooth your baby to sleep. The app lets select how long you want the music / sounds to play for, and will loops until that time has finished. When you start the music / sounds your phone will start a looping animation which will light up a dark room. Like this app on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Sleepy-Baby/162424940495735
release_text: Fixes a problem on some Samsung devices Other bug fixes

description: It is Christmas Eve and you just want to go to bed and wake up on Christmas morning. But the tree is broken, the house it too cold, Mr. Peabody's tacky Xmas display is annoying and as always your brother won't go to bed. Explore, interact with your environment and solve puzzles in this old-school adventure game. • Classic adventure game fun on your hand-held device. • Colorful retro-styled graphics. • Explore a lighthearted and humorous environment. • Use your wits and the items you find to get the house ready for Christmas.
release_text: Bug fixes.

description: Congrats, you've just discovered the world's best period tracker app. LADYTIMER predicts menstrual cycles, helping women to get pregnant or avoid pregnancy. LADYTIMER uses the latest scientific methods to accurately pinpoint a woman's fertile days. The app helps you while trying to conceive, lets you switch to pregnancy mode and back to period calendar mode after birth or miscarriage. * Easy to use period tracker * Ovulation calendar options: PMS, symptoms, moods, weight, temperature, etc * Period, Ovulation and medical exams reminders * Fertility calendar with temperature charts * Menstrual period history * Track irregular periods * Chat and Direct Messaging * Share menstrual calendar data with your doctor or partner * LadyCloud automatic backup and sync * Baby planner with boy or girl forecast * Ovulation App portable to any smartphone * Intimacy tracker * Birth control pill reminder * Ovulation calculator with cervical mucus tracker * Free Ovulation calendar print option * Fertility educational videos * A personal diary for every woman * Customizable tracker with themes Why this app ? Ladytimer uses all available data such as ovulation tests, BBT and mucus to calculate and predict your actual ovulation time. It's done automatially and the complexity of the data analysis is hidden from the user, making the app simple to use yet very powerful. If you have occasional irregular cycles like almost 40% of women, then Ladytimer will be more accurate and reliable then the majority of apps that rely on simplistic average calculations. Simply track your start period day every month. After that the app calculates the menstrual cycle for you. Enter your morning body temperature for precise fertility tracking. The app will use it to calculate ovulation. See when you are more likely to conceive a boy or a girl. Enter and track symptoms, moods, notes, weight, intimacy, ovulation tests, birth control pills, etc for any day. Chat with other Ladytimer app users. Your period tracker data can be saved online and imported to any smartphone when needed. Never lose your calendar data when switching phones. LadyCloud synchronization does it all automatically for you. It's very easy to share your period calendar with your doctor or partner. Chose the data you wish to share. — Ladytimer • the most advanced menstruation calendar —
release_text: bug fixes need help? android@ladytimer.com

description: A powerful Loop based DAW for Android. Timeline sample sequencer, including ability to match loop BPM to project BPM, allow you to pitch one shots and loops up and down, as well as have 3 insert FX per track with automation. Quickly make music using samples and loops, similar to Sony's ACID software or Apple's garageband. Please Note: Reloop does not record sound at this time ! Real time live loop audition - hear how a loop will sound while currently playing what's already programmed. You can get additional FREE samples from the market! Look for "Reloop Pak". OR load your own samples too on to your sdcard. Get TONS more free samples from http://www.musicradar.com 's sample download page Use my Sonic Chop app (sold separate) to chop samples from Music on your device and load them right into ReLoop! PLEASE NOTE: ReLoop has recently been updated with realtime timestretching. You need a good processor, at *minimum* 800mhz, but recommended 1000mhz (1Ghz) processor in order to run many tracks at once. ● WAV import - LOAD YOUR OWN samples and loops from SDCARD. ● 3 real-time FX : Delay, Low pass filter, and Distortion. ● Parameter Automation: Record mixer and FX adjustments during playback. ● CHANGE PITCH on each event on the timeline to build melodies ● SLICE loops and rearrange. ● SNAP up to 1/16, or turn off SNAP and lay samples wherever you want. ● COPY/PASTE samples or entire blocks ● WAV Export. ● 24 bit WAV import support, no need to convert your samples or loops to use them. Use samples from loopmasters, primeloops, etc, right away. ● Uses as much screen space as you have, works great on Galaxy tablet screens. ● Easy to use interface - Drag/Drop loops on the timeline. - TAP a track number to bring up a screen to load a sample or loop to that track. - LONG PRESS a track number to bring up the FX dialog for that track. - TOUCH AND DRAG TO THE RIGHT off a track number to add it's sample to the timeline - LONG PRESS a sample to select it for further editing. - LONG PRESS a sample AND DRAG TO THE LEFT OFF THE SCREEN to delete the sample from the timeline. - LONG PRESS a sample and move it left to right to move its position on the timeline. - CHECK THE MENU for even more operations such as slice, copy, undo, snap, etc. ● CD quality sound (44Khz 16bit stereo). PERMISSIONS: PHONE STATE/IDENTITY - used to stop playing if a phone call comes in. IDENTITY is NOT used for anything and it not read at all. SDCARD WRITE/READ - used to read sound files, and to save settings and songs more soon!
release_text: 2.0.8 - Changed drawing and colors. Fixed some bugs - fixed a preview bug that wouldn't audition sounds. Fixed a zoom in /out bug that would throw the timeline to some high value if you zoomed while panning the display.

description: “Polyglot” is an easy to use mobile manual of Spanish Grammar. You will learn to make simple sentences in Spanish in a short period of time. All you need is to spend 5-10 minutes a day practicing. In a week you will feel that you know some Spanish. Features: • Simple and intuitive interface • Pronunciation of Spanish words and phrases • Integrated speech recognition for pronunciation exercises • No Internet connection required • No adverts or annoying popups Contents: 1. The Present Tense of –ar verbs. 2. The Present Tense of –er verbs. Interrogative pronouns. 3. The Present Tense of –ir verbs. 4. The Present Tense. Irregular verbs, part 1. 5. The Present Tense. Irregular verbs, part 2. 6. Nouns. Articles. Prepositions of place. 7. The absence of the article 8. The Past Tense of –ar verbs 9. The Past Tense of –er and –ir verbs 10. The Past Tense. Irregular verbs 11. Me gusta... (I like...) 12. Adjectives 13. The Future Tense. Regular verbs 14. The Future Tense. Irregular verbs 15. Imperative mood. Do that! 16. Imperative mood. Don't do that! “Polyglot. Spanish” will help you and your children to learn basic principles of Spanish grammar in a simple form. How it works The program shows you simple sentences in English in one of the three forms (affirmative, negative, interrogative). You have to translate the sentence into Spanish using the words on the screen. If your answer is right, the program will encourage you. If you are wrong, the program will show you the right answer. While you are making the sentence, all the selected words are pronounced. Then the correct answer is read aloud. If you have chosen a wrong word by mistake, push the “Back” button to cancel your choice. The program creates a random sentence from the words in the dictionary. And it continues until you get bored. Each lesson is almost endless. You decide yourself where to finish it. Attention! This program includes the option to make in-app purchases: ★ Voice input (0.99 $) • You can practice your pronunciation. • It helps to eliminate psychological barrier which prevents you from speaking. • It helps to get rid of the accent. ★ Open all lessons (2.99 $) • For those who want to choose the order of lessons themselves. ¡Aprender español!
release_text: * new design

description: Create charming retro style photographs with real-time effects. These effects work great on selfies and other portraits but also for many other subjects. For example, you can easily enhance your landscapes, cityscapes and nature pictures with filtering. The filters mimic analog processes, vintage optics and wear and tear typical for traditional film photography. Many frame styles are available from classic white to sprocket holes.
release_text: null

description: Landscape Live Wallpaper offers you a unique experience of natural wonders right on your smartphone. You will enjoy this live wallpaper marvelous landscape pictures of dark green forest, sparkling waterfalls, flower fields, roaring rivers, enchanting woodlands and peaceful countryside. Landscapes Live Wallpaper will assure you that heaven is a place on earth with amazing HD images of flourishing nature. “Landscape Wallpaper” is just what you need if you want to witness the change of seasons right on your phone screen. This cool new app for Android™ is available now, so don't waist your time and download it now! - Amazing 3D live wallpaper for your phone! - Interactive feature: Tap on the screen and new landscape pictures will appear immediately! - There is full support for landscape mode and home-screen switching! - This beautiful, free and enjoyable background is waiting for you! Installation instructions: Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live Wallpapers - You can choose from several different themes. - HD graphics and open GL. - Optimized Battery Usage. - Compatible with 99% mobile phone devices. Landscape Live Wallpaper fully supports horizontal orientation and looks amazing on tablet devices as well as on phones You can walk the fields of gold, swim in a deep blue sea, rest by peaceful lake and see all the natural beauty of this wonderful world! These beautiful high resolution “landscape photos” will take you for a walk through shady grove or valley of colorful flowers. You can hike across breathtaking green hill and sail the calm rivers anytime you want with these magical live wallpaper backgrounds. HD pictures of inspiring nature will be the healing sight for sore eyes. “Landscape LWP” brings sun-bathed meadow, high snowy mountains, dark enchated forest to your Samsung Galaxy or tablet device. One of the best things is that you can switch from one season to another in a second: winter, autumn, summer and spring pictures... all of them on the palm of your hand within this one live wallpaper! Highlands of Scotland, Norwegian fjords, lake district of North West England...you can see it all without taking trips to those countries! Every wonder of nature you've ever wanted to visit is now available for visiting thanks to this new “Landscape Live Wallpaper”! With this unique high definition “live wallpaper” you will experience beautiful sunrises and sunsets of lands far, far away, with mesmerizing blending colors that create incredible works of art in the sky. Let these landscapes inspire you and take you over seven seas, to places you've never been before! Take a stroll in the nature, make a bouquet of cute spring flowers, run carefree through the valley while the autumn leaves pleasantly rustle beneath your feet. Walking in nature is said to have curative properties so don't wait and check for yourself what kind of impression will these beautiful HD images leave on you! “Free wallpaper” like this is perfect for all nature lovers who crave to be inspired and are looking for an great experience! Let the untouched nature overwhelm you and engross your senses with rustling waterfals, misty woods, sunny meadows and crystal clear waters. Background images of stunning landscapes will take your breath away and you will be hooked on your new live wallpaper scenery! Many different pictures give you the possibility to choose the wallpaper that suits you the most ! description: This game is in romanian language. "Raspunde la intrebare" is a general knowledge game. Like in any other trivia quiz game you will receive a question and have to choose the correct answer from 4 different choices. The questions are grouped by difficulty. At the beginning you will receive easy questions, but after you gather enough gold you can unlock 2 different difficulties: medium and hard. Give correct answer to as many successive questions and at every 5 correct answers you will receive a bonus. You have only 30 seconds to give an answer. If the answer given is a wrong one or the time is up you will end the game session and loose gold - not all, relax ;). Do not know the answer? Do not panic ... there may be a solution ... one difference from standard trivia quiz games is that you can always take 2 hints for each question - if you have enough gold :). The price will be increased for each hint taken in one session of play. The hint price can be seen in a red circle. Still need help? Then you have the option to guess the right answer or to retreat, raising the white flag and loose only 1 gold. Tips: Do not have enough gold for hints? 1)Go to a lower difficulty level and gain gold. 2)Give the correct answer to as many consecutive questions to get the bonus. Do not know the answer and have no time left? 3)Get a hint, just pick an answer or retreat - do not let time to beat you. We will add new questions periodically. Follow us on the facebook at https://www.facebook.com/BogdanIceDevelop to see news, to propose new questions or new features that you want to be implemented. For any question or problem send us an email at bogdanice.contact@gmail.com .
release_text: 1.9.9 Added new questions. 1.9.7 Lower the hint cost 1.9.6 Added more questions. 1.9.3 Added new leaderboards and achievements. 1.9.2 Added more questions. 1.9.1 Added more questions. 1.9.0 We added a new game mode - Challenge 1.8.4 Added more questions. Review the data base for errors. In easy mode when you choose to surrender the correct answer will be shown without asking for more points.

description: Remember how you used to play "Sea Battle" (also known as "Battleship") game with your friends as a child? Remember how you drew ships with pen on squared paper? Features: - clean graphics and sound effects - optimized for phones and tablets of different sizes - play against Android device and earn scores - play Bluetooth game with your friends - multiplayer online game via Google Play Game Services - ability to play with friends or random opponent via Quick Game option - earn scores by preserving your ships, shells and playing fast - post your scores to public or private Leaderboards Uses Google Game services for Online Multiplayer and Leaderboards, so log in to G+ account might be needed.
