description: Eye Rest Reminder will remind you eye rest time periodically. It will help you from dry eye syndrome or failing of eyesight. 1. Intro Smartphones have been widespread all over the world and failing of eyesight has became the major problem. This is because mobile screens are so small that every people tends to look it closely. Also using it on moving, devices wobble too frequently and eyes get tired soon. To prevent from failing of eyesight, you need to do these actions periodically. 1) Close your eyes and get rest 2) Look farther to train eye muscles But while we are concentrating on device, it's not easy. This 'Eye Rest Reminder' will remind you eye rest time and induce to eyes rest. 2. Features - Time bar appears at the edge of the screen. Time bar is a visual clock that shows continuous used time. It will be filled up to 3 pieces, and will appear whatever app your are running like games or web browser. - When the specified time has elapsed, the entire screen will smoothly became foggy and remind you that this is eye rest time. It is time to close eyes and get rest or look farther. - If you need to see the screen urgently, you can easily dismiss it by touching the time bar - Time bar can be attached to any side by dragging - Viewing time, rest time, color properties are adjustable in settings page. You can expand the viewing time if you feel it's short, or you can even disable it temporarily. 3. Etc - This app is not made to disturb your work. It may feel like annoying when it makes the screen foggy periodically but few seconds of rest is very good for your eyes. You will be soon accustomed to it. - Please recommend this app to your friends who are struggling with poor eyesight. The difference between full version and free version is only the ads. If you don't like ads or you would like to donate, please buy the full version.
release_text: Fixed wrong linking package name when chainging notification visibility for Android 4.0 and above. Added vibration alarm feature to notify user at end of rest time.

description: Мобильное приложение Redigo — удобный компактный гид по странам мира от Австралии до Японии в вашем телефоне, оффлайн карты. С приложением Redigo не нужно тратить деньги на дорогие путеводители, таскать с собой в дальней поездке тяжелые справочники, карты и журналы. Вся необходимая для путешественника информация, всегда под рукой: — общая справка о стране (виза, часовой пояс, валюта, язык, как добраться и многое другое); — информация о городах и местах, которые рекомендуется посетить; — офлайн карты, где отмечены все достопримечательности; — обширная фотогалерея; — информация об актуальных событиях; — разговорник на шести иностранных языках, плюс разговорник в картинках, который позволит объясниться без слов. Приложение и оффлайн карты можно скачать бесплатно, все сервисы не требуют интернет-соединения, что очень важно, когда вы находитесь в роуминге. Начните готовиться к увлекательному путешествию по странам мира прямо сейчас! Офлайн карты доступны для всех городов, в том числе для таких популярных, как: Анталия, Берлин, Барселона, Будапешт, Вена, Копенгаген, Лондон, Лос-Анджелес, Милан, Москва, Мюнхен, Ньй-Йорк, Пекин, Париж, Прага, Пхукет, Рига, Сан-Франциско, Санкт-Петербург, Стамбул, Таллин, Ханой, Хошимин. Mobile application Redigo - handy compact guide countries from Australia to Japan on your phone, offline maps. With the application Redigo not need to spend money on expensive travel guides carry a long trip in heavy encyclopedias, maps and magazines. All the necessary information for the traveler always on hand: - General certificate of the country (visa, time zone, currency, language, how to get and much more); - Information about the towns and places to visit that are recommended; - Offline maps, where all the sights are marked; - Extensive photo gallery; - Information about current events; - Phrase in six foreign languages, plus Phrasebook in pictures that will explain without words. Application and offline maps can be downloaded free of charge, all the services do not require an Internet connection, which is very important when you are roaming. Start preparing for a fascinating journey through the countries of the world right now! Offline maps are available for all cities, including such popular as Antalya, Berlin, Barcelona, ​​Budapest, Vienna, Copenhagen, London, Los Angeles, Milan, Moscow, Munich, Ny City, Beijing, Paris, Prague, Phuket, Riga, San Francisco, St. Petersburg, Istanbul, Tallinn, Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City.

description: Root required for this application! The pro version will contain more features in the future, right now it is available for only $1.99! This is an open source project! https://github.com/Stericson/AdbdSecure If you have a rooted phone and you have debugging enabled on your device then your device is at risk for attack! This project: https://github.com/kosborn/p2p-adb/ provides a set of tools for attacking your device from another device if you have debugging enabled on your phone. Also read this blog: http://commonsware.com/blog/2012/10/09/usb-debugging-hazardous-health.html Here is a video showing what this application helps protect you from: https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_detailpage&v=ah7DWawLax8#t=429s This application can help guard against this in conjunction with a password, pin, or pattern protected device. For this application to work and be effective you must have a lock screen enabled password, pin, or pattern lock. This application will turn adbd on when the phone is unlocked and will turn it off when the screen goes off. This application works with Tasker, you can use Tasker to enable and disable adbdSecure on a wide variety of different conditions. I'll add more features to this as time goes on :) Thanks to jairomeo for the High resolution image and application icon!
release_text: 1.7 Added Root Access prompt when opening the app. 1.6 Fixed a bug when ending protection. 1.5 Fixed a small bug with the service. 1.4 Changed notification icons and launcher icons to be compliant with icon design guidelines. Added Tasker support. 1.3 Added preferences for notifications, fixed a small error. 1.2 Added preferences

description: Widgets not appearing on 4.1+ (Jellybeen) devices? Please email for eas fix. *You must have UCCW installed on your phone to use this theme.* Download UCCW for free from the Play Store.. Please support my work with a 5 star rating. I have many more amazing themes coming your way! This theme has been tested on the HTC One X, Galaxy Note 2 and the Galaxy S3 and works perfectly using Nova Launcher Prime. It will also work on many other devices but have yet to be tested. I will post when it has been confirmed to be working on other devices. Don't want to take the risk? Check back regularly for an updated device selection. Please email me with any issues rather than posting them in the review section of the Play store. Thank you. This is a single screen theme with all the goodies that the average user uses. You have your agenda, time, date, battery readings, social notifications, weather and shortcuts to messaging, gmail, phone, Facebook, Chrome, the market, camera and gallery. Not personalized enough? Through the UCCW editor you can change the font and background colors to your liking as well as your hotspots to your shortcuts. Tutorials: Note.. This may look difficult, but it really isn't. I wrote this for anyone who has never touched UCCW or a custom launcher. Every step is here. Nova Launcher Prime setup: Press menu on your phone Press Nova settings >desktop>desktop grid. Set rows to 6 and columns to 6. back out.. >Width margin. Set to none. back out.. >Height margin. Set to none. back out.. Make sure "show shadows" is unchecked > "home screens" and remove all but one screen. back out.. >"scroll effect" set to none. back out.. >Wallpaper scrolling. Set to off. back out.. Uncheck "infinate scroll". Scrool to the bottom and open the "advanced" tab and check "resize all widgets". Back out to main menu >Dock. Uncheck "enable dock". back out.. >Look and feel. Uncheck "show notification bar". back out.. >Gestures and buttons. >Swipe up. Click "app drawer". >Gestures and buttons. >Swipe down. Click "expand notifications". Done. UCCW setup: After you download the theme... Clear your homescreen of any icons or widgets Long press your homescreen Select "widgets" Click on UCCW Click the 4x1 widget Find and click "softly battery" Touch the white hand After the widget appears, long press it Click "resize" and resize it so it spans the width of your screen. Repeat this process for the rest of the Softly widgets. Once all 6 widgets are placed on the screen, rearange them in this order.... Status bar Facebook and messaging Gmail and phone Weather Shortcuts Done. Changing colors and hotspots: Open your app drawer Find and click UCCW Press your phone menu key Click "Lock widgets (Hotspot mode)". Click "off". Go to your home page Click one of the widgets Here you can change any color you want If you mess anything up beyond simple repair just delete the widget and add it again. *Don't add the new widget through the UCCW editor as the softly widgets will not show up in the list. You must make a whole new widget by long pressing your home screen.* To change the hotspots... scroll to the bottom of the UCCW editor Click a hotspot and choose what you'd like to change it to. Once you're done editing... go back into your app drawer >UCCW >phone menu >Lock widgets (hotspot folders) >press "on". Enjoy your awesome screen! FAQ: How to change temperature units? Open the UCCW app in your app drawer >menu> check Celsius. Why does the skin not show up in the list? This is a Google related issue with some Jellybean devices. If you have this issue, email me. Ill send you a fix. Follow me on Google + for updates and new themes that Im working on. https://plus.google.com/112162095736133226513/posts

description: Prepare for high-octane action and the ultimate Motocross adrenaline rush! Push the envelope for big air, speed, and style to become the undisputed champion! Challenge opponents online or in single player events including Motocross, Freestyle, Step Up, and more! STUNNING VISUALS Incredible HD graphics put you right in the dirt! Every jump, trick, and crash are rendered with bone crushing clarity. GET AMPED Compete for freestyle dominance with insane tricks. Upgrade your skills to score even higher! BECOME A PRO Create your own rider and go head-to-head with real world pros Wes Agee and Josh Hansen! Tailor your look with apparel from Metal Mulisha, Monster Energy, GoPro and other sponsors! FINE TUNE YOUR RIDE Outfit your bike with over 800 custom configurations. Be strategic with upgrades and leave your rivals in the dust! Get ready for Motocross Meltdown! --------------------------------------------- Motocross Meltdown is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items. Use of this application is governed by Glu Mobile’s Terms of Use. Collection and use of personal data are subject to Glu Mobile’s Privacy Policy. Both policies are available at www.glu.com. Additional terms may also apply. FOLLOW US at Twitter @glumobile facebook.com/glumobile

description: By selecting Install, you are consenting to the installation of RBC Bank (U.S) Remote Deposit. You are entitled to and are consenting to future updates or upgrades to RBC Bank (U.S.) Remote Deposit , which may be automatically installed as per your device or operating system default or user-initiated settings. You may withdraw your consent by deleting RBC Bank (U.S.) Remote Deposit from your smartphone. With RBC Bank (U.S.) Remote Deposit, you can take the bank with you wherever you go! It’s a convenient service that lets you use your smartphone to securely make electronic deposits to your RBC Bank (U.S.) checking or savings account. HOW TO ENROLL: 1. Download the mobile app to your smartphone. 2. Call us at 1-800 ROYAL 5-3 (1-800-769-2553) to get your temporary user name and password. 3. Sign in to our U.S. Remote Deposit website at https://xpressdeposit.com/xd/?bid=114098099 to set up your preferred user name, password, and security questions. 4. Accept the Terms and Conditions. HOW TO MAKE A DEPOSIT: To deposit your check, first endorse (sign) the back of your check, and below your signature, write the words “For Deposit Only RBC Bank RDC.” 1. Open the Remote Deposit application and sign in using the Remote Deposit user ID and personal identification number that you established at enrollment. 2. Select Deposit and the Account. Then enter the amount. 3. Take pictures of both the front and back of the endorsed check, making sure you get all four corners of the check in the picture. 4. Click Continue. You’ll receive a message that the upload is successful. 5. Select Submit to view the deposit confirmation. It’s that easy! We'll send you an email to let you know we've received your deposit, and we'll follow up with an email confirmation once your deposit has been processed and the funds are in your account. RBC Bank (U.S.) Remote Deposit lets you view the last five days of deposit activity! For more transaction history or other money transfer and bill payment features, sign in to RBC Bank (U.S.) Online Banking. More Information Whenever You Need It Remember, you can always visit rbcbank.com to: • Obtain information about RBC Bank, learn about products and services, and see our latest offers and promotions • Access timely financial information and cross-border advice specific to your cross-border banking needs • Obtain important client information and forms PRIVACY: Your consent and acknowledge that RBC Bank (U.S.) Remote Deposit performs functions that require permission to access to the camera on your mobile device to take a photo of the check to be deposited. For assistance with removal of RBC Bank (U.S.) Remote Deposit, access instructions at: http://www.rbcbank.com/help-and-faqs/about-making-deposits/u-s-remote-deposit/index.html or contact RMDEPCAP@rbc.com RBC Bank | RBC Bank (Georgia), N.A., a subsidiary of Royal Bank of Canada 8081 Arco Corporate Drive, Suite 500, Raleigh, NC 27617 www.rbcbank.com
